title: Elementary Russian I
description: An introduction to Russian language and culture. First half of a survey of basic Russian grammar and the development of the four language skills of listening, speaking, reading, and writing.  The course includes an orientation to aspects of everyday life in Russia.  Humanities credit awarded upon successful completion of RUSS 1002 or RUSS 2001.
